a.title: Return to the homepage on the district site.

div.p: Early College High School (P-TECH) Coming Soon!

a.span: Middle School Daily Schedule & Learning Resources
High School Daily Schedule & Learning Resources
COVID - 19 Mental and Behavioral Health Information

span.p: Ingram Elementary "packet swap" is Monday, May 4th. Parents will need to drop off their child's previous work and pick up the new instructional units for continued remote instruction. Pick up time and location:

ul.li: Circle drive in front of the IES cafeteria; 7:30am-9:00am and 11:00am-1:00pm

span.p: Ingram Middle School and Ingram Tom Moore High School instructional resources and assignments are all found online through each teacher's Google classroom. Teachers have already been in contact with students and parents regarding how remote learning will proceed. If you have any questions regarding remote learning or do not have internet access and need printed materials, please contact your child's campus for assistance.
Helpful Resource: COVID-19 Support: Special Education and Special Populations

div.p: All UIL activities have been postponed until May 4. We will update you as soon as we have more information.

ul.li: One pickup location for all students
Curbside pickup at Ingram Elementary cafeteria drive
Students do not have to be in the vehicle for the meal to be distributed; however, the parent or guardian must be the one to pick up the meals.

p.a: Grading Guidelines for Remote Learning - April 6, 2020
